com.awesome.awesomefifteenpuzzle

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.awesome.awesomefifteenpuzzle.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object

    The Puzzle Board

    The model class of the project which manipulate the actual array puzzle and then the FifteenPuzzle invokes the display accordingly

    This class is a singleton since there should be only one instance in the whole project

    Since:
    12/2/2016
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Team Awesome 2.0

      • move

        public char move(int tile)
        Takes a tile and moves it if possible then returns the type of movement:
        • r: move right
        • l: move left
        • u: move up
        • d: move down
        • f: false movement
        Parameters:
        tile - to be moved
        Returns:
        type of movement

      • find

        public int find(int tile)
        Finds the index of a given tile in the puzzle array
        Parameters:
        tile - of which index is needed
        Returns:
        the index or -100 if it does not exists

      • updatePuzzle

        public void updatePuzzle(java.lang.String stringPuzzle)
        Updates the puzzle array as the display after a shuffle in the game
        Parameters:
        stringPuzzle - the newly shuffled board pulled from the server

      • solve

        public void solve(java.lang.String stringMoves)
        Updates the puzzle array as well as the display after solving the game
        Parameters:
        stringMoves - the list of tiles to move to solve the puzzle
